name: Time Mansion (Prototype)
description:
A short puzzle game based on time, not much at this state. If you got about 10 minutes to spare please do try it out. The main goal for now is to find the golden watch shown in the icon.

After a few months of "hard" work the prototype is done. What I want now is your opinion.

  • Should I continue working on the project?
  • What could be improved?
  • Features you would want to see?

Feedback can be given on my discord: https://discord.gg/5N7TDs

If I continue I need to get an artist.
